channel.title: About Rich on About
channel.description: Recent content in About Rich on About

item.title: Books I Already Read
item.description: Already Read Slaughterhouse Five The 3 body problem. (book 1) Thinking, Fast and Slow Siddhartha by Hermann Hess - not bad, good story of the buddha, recommended by joe pontes. Pastwatch - interesting take on an alternate history of the world if Columbus acted differently Kings of the Wyld. (Schuft recommendation, so of course it was good) - fun fantasy book, narrator voice was hard to get used to though The birth of plenty – good, but you can just read the 4 bullet summary of it.

item.title: Books to Read
item.description: To Read Helldivers Swipe file podcast dave gearhard How I built this podcast Disgraceland podcast Ray Dalio Principles Spellmonger Red Rising Galaxy's Edge High Output Management by Andy Grove The next Ender book The Quantum Magician Jeff Sharra How we decide by jonah lehrer
